name: Pengu Peril
description:
Pengu's iceberg is melting. Keep them dry for as long as possible!

Controls:

  • WASD / Arrow keys to move
  • Space to lift or place an ice block

Contributors (alphabetically):

  • Alice Moh: Unity dev
  • Rebekah Ku: Unity dev
  • Sam Ong: Music
  • Sarah Tsai: Art

Rate it: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/50/$289367
